citation.article-title: Geobacillus debilis sp. nov., a novel obligately thermophilic bacterium isolated from a cool soil environment, and reassignment of Bacillus pallidus to Geobacillus pallidus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Geobacillus pallidus (Scholz et al. 1988) Banat, Marchant and Rahman comb. nov.
Basonym: Bacillus pallidus Scholz et al. 1988.
The description is identical to that given for the genus Geobacillus by Nazina et al. (2001) and the species description given by Scholz et al. (1987).
